trait.name: Bloodied Wild Magic
entries: While {@status Bloodied|XPHB}, the noggle has a {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} of 30 feet and it can choose for any damage it deals to be Force damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The noggle makes two attacks, using Noggling Stick or Befuddling Ray in any combination.

action.name: Noggling Stick
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) Psychic damage.

action.name: Befuddling Ray
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Psychic damage, and the target subtracts {@dice 1d4} from the next saving throw it makes before the end of the noggle's next turn.
